name: Hoots
description:
Winter is coming -- er ... Winter is here already! The Hoots hanging out in their tree watching the snow fall trying to stay warm :) Help them out by making some matches!

Hoots is the simplest and the cutest match game you've ever played.

Just swipe the owls so three colors match 3 up, down, left, right, or diagonally. It's that easy! Get extra time for double matches. Be quick though, you only have 60 seconds to get a high score.

Try the most adorable match game for free today!




If you have any issues, comments, concerns, or you just want to say hi and show us some love, you can email us at support@simplemachinestudios.com
